namespace {{ namespacename }};

public class {{ modelname }}CreatedEventHandler : INotificationHandler<{{ modelname }}CreatedEvent>
{
        private readonly ILogger<{{ modelname }}CreatedEventHandler> _logger;

        public {{ modelname }}CreatedEventHandler(
            ILogger<{{ modelname }}CreatedEventHandler> logger
            )
        {
            _logger = logger;
        }
        public Task Handle({{ modelname }}CreatedEvent notification, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
        {
            _logger.LogInformation("Domain Event: {DomainEvent}", notification.GetType().FullName);
            return Task.CompletedTask;

}
